Ingredients.1: 6 cups loosely packed arugula, or more to taste

Ingredients.9: 1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Finely chop arugula and set aside.

Directions.2: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Saute rice in the hot oil until it begins to look toasted, about 1 minute. Add onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Pour in wine and stir frequently until most of the liquid is absorbed, 5 to 7 minutes.

Directions.3: Stir in vegetable broth, 1 cup at a time, stirring almost constantly. Add arugula with the 5th cup of vegetable broth; pour in remaining broth, stirring almost constantly, until rice is tender yet firm to the bite, 20 to 25 minutes.

Directions.4: Remove from heat and stir in Parmesan cheese and butter. Add salt and pepper to taste.
